response_text: The official pricing page for EMnify can be found at: [https://www.emnify.com/pricing](https://www.emnify.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Design your IoT connectivity

Create a flexible plan that grows with your needs. Here’s how our pricing works:

[01 ![Image 39: sim-card-2](https://www.emnify.com/hubfs/Assets/Icons%20Large/sim-card-2.svg) ### SIM All our SIMs are eUICC. Choose from our range of SIM form factors: * 2FF (Mini SIM) * 3FF (Micro SIM) * 4FF (Nano SIM) * MFF2 (embedded SIM) * Consumer eSIM](https://www.emnify.com/plans-and-packages#1)

[02 ![Image 40: chart-bar-2](https://www.emnify.com/hubfs/Assets/Icons%20Large/chart-bar-2.svg?1) ### Data plan Design a data plan based on your business needs. This includes: * In which countries you will deploy * How many devices you will connect * The amount of data your device will require](https://www.emnify.com/plans-and-packages#2)

[03 ![Image 41: textbox-star](https://www.emnify.com/hubfs/Assets/Icons%20Large/textbox-star.svg?1) ### Features Expand your connectivity with the wide range of standard features, or enhance them with premium features like: * Free Test Allowance with automatic activation * Multiple workspace accounts * AWS Cloud Connect](https://www.emnify.com/plans-and-packages#3)

[04 ![Image 42: comment-2-dots](https://www.emnify.com/hubfs/Assets/Icons%20Large/comment-2-dots.svg?1) ### Support plan Select a plan suitable to your support requirements with our premium plans offering faster response and resolution times: * Standard support * Business support * Enterprise support](https://www.emnify.com/plans-and-packages#4)

### Configure your  
data plan

Your price point depends on the scale and complexity of your business goals and objectives. Factors like the number of devices, SIM form factor, data allowances, and region all influence the final cost.

By offering a custom-built plan, we ensure you’re only paying for exactly what you need—nothing more, nothing less.

[Start configuring](https://www.emnify.com/plans-and-packages#Form)

*   [01 SIM](https://www.emnify.com/plans-and-packages#1)
*   [02Data plan](https://www.emnify.com/plans-and-packages#2)
*   [03Features](https://www.emnify.com/plans-and-packages#3)
*   [04Support plan](https://www.emnify.com/plans-and-packages#4)

01

Choose your SIM form factor
---------------------------

Your IoT deployment needs the right SIM to ensure continuous, global connectivity. Our [IoT SIMs](https://www.emnify.com/iot-supernetwork/emnify-iot-esim) are available in multiple form factors to fit your specific requirements. All our SIMs are eUICC by default, enabling remote profile management and Over-The-Air (OTA) updates.

![Image 43: Emnify-SIM-cards](https://www.emnify.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets/emnify-com-2024-rebrand/media/text%2Bmedia/Emnify-SIM-cards.webp?width=1080&name=Emnify-SIM-cards.webp)

*   **2FF (Mini SIM)**
*   **3FF (Micro SIM)**
*   **4FF (Nano SIM)**

These standard removable SIM cards come in two different grades: commercial and industrial.  

*   **MFF2 (embedded SIM)**

A physical card soldered directly onto the device's circuit board.

*   **Consumer eSIM**

An eSIM in consumer devices such as iPads, POS devices, etc.

02

Build your data plan
--------------------

Explore our configurable data plans that will keep your IoT devices connected wherever they are deployed.

[Let’s calculate it together](https://www.emnify.com/plans-and-packages#Form)

![Image 44: Circles with data usage](https://www.emnify.com/hubfs/Assets/emnify-com-2024-rebrand/media/text%2Bmedia/emnify-flexible-data-allowance2%201.svg)

Flexible data allowances
------------------------

Whether your devices need just a few MBs or lots of GBs, we’ve got you covered.

**Low data usage**

*   Perfect for low-data devices like sensors or basic tracking
*   Data range: 1 MB to 50 MB per month
*   Often used for: trackers, smart meters, etc.

**Medium data usage**

*   Ideal for moderate use applications
*   Data Range: 50 MB to 1 GB per month
*   Often used for: payment terminals, EV charging stations, digital signage, etc.

**High data usage**

*   Best for data-heavy use cases
*   Data range: more than 1 GB per month
*   Often used for: push-to-talk, dashcams, surveillance, etc.

![Image 45: worldmap 190+ countirues and 540+ networks](https://www.emnify.com/hubfs/Assets/emnify-com-2024-rebrand/media/text%2Bmedia/emnify-worldmap-190%2B-countirues-540%2Bnetworks.svg)

Where do you need coverage?
---------------------------

Where do you need coverage? Whether your IoT devices are deployed in North America, Europe, or across the globe, we’ve got you covered. Our global network spans over 540 networks in 190+ countries, providing consistent connectivity wherever your devices are located.

Whether your devices are stationary or moving between countries, we offer flexible solutions to keep them connected.

[Check out our full coverage here](https://www.emnify.com/iot-supernetwork/global-iot-coverage)

Control consumption. Eliminate Surprises
----------------------------------------

From predictable data allowances to shared pools for multiple devices, we make it easy to manage your data efficiently while keeping costs under control.

[Talk to us about your needs](https://www.emnify.com/talk-to-us)

*   ### Fixed Allowance Plans
    
    Each device receives a specific amount of data per month, ensuring predictable usage and costs.
    
    **Example:** 10 devices with 100 MB each.
    
    ![Image 46: emnify portal dashboard on mobile screen](https://www.emnify.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets/emnify-com-2024-rebrand/media/text%2Bmedia/emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp?width=800&name=emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp)
    
*   ### Pooled Allowance Plans
    
    Share data across all devices, allowing those with higher data needs to consume more without incurring overage fees  
      
    **Example:** 100 devices, each with a 100 MB plan, contribute to a shared pool totaling 10 GB. If one device uses 9 GB, the others can collectively consume the remaining 1 GB.
    
    ![Image 47: emnify-mobile-dashboard](https://www.emnify.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets/emnify-com-2024-rebrand/media/text%2Bmedia/emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp?width=800&name=emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp)
    
*   ### Pay-Per-Use
    
    Only pay for the data you use, with tiered pricing based on number of SIMs.  
      
    **Best For:**  Pilot programs, seasonal, or small-scale deployments.
    
    ![Image 48: emnify-mobile-dashboard](https://www.emnify.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets/emnify-com-2024-rebrand/media/text%2Bmedia/emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp?width=800&name=emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp)
    
*   ### Commitment options
    
    For larger deployments or long-term projects, we offer commitment plans that help you lower your costs as you deploy more devices. The more you commit, the more you save. 
    
    ![Image 49: emnify-mobile-dashboard](https://www.emnify.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets/emnify-com-2024-rebrand/media/text%2Bmedia/emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp?width=800&name=emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp)
    
*   ### Multiple data plans
    
    Do you have a diverse set of devices or requirements? No problem. You can mix and match different data plans to suit your unique needs.
    
    ![Image 50: emnify-mobile-dashboard](https://www.emnify.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets/emnify-com-2024-rebrand/media/text%2Bmedia/emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp?width=800&name=emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp)
    

![Image 51: emnify portal dashboard on mobile screen](https://www.emnify.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets/emnify-com-2024-rebrand/media/text%2Bmedia/emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp?width=800&name=emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp)

![Image 52: emnify-mobile-dashboard](https://www.emnify.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets/emnify-com-2024-rebrand/media/text%2Bmedia/emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp?width=800&name=emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp)

![Image 53: emnify-mobile-dashboard](https://www.emnify.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets/emnify-com-2024-rebrand/media/text%2Bmedia/emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp?width=800&name=emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp)

![Image 54: emnify-mobile-dashboard](https://www.emnify.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets/emnify-com-2024-rebrand/media/text%2Bmedia/emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp?width=800&name=emnify-mobile-dashboard.webp)

![Image 56: illustration of globe and satellite](https://www.emnify.com/hubfs/Assets/emnify-com-2024-rebrand/media/text%2Bmedia/Satelliteglobe-White2.svg)

Satellite connectivity
----------------------

Expand beyond traditional networks with satellite connectivity for devices in remote areas like deserts, or mountains—perfect for remote monitoring.

**SatPlus 10**  

*   10MB data & 10 satellite messages per SIM/month.
*   Pooled usage across SIMs.

**SatPlus 30**  

*   10MB data & 30 satellite messages per SIM/month.
*   Pooled usage across SIMs.

**SatPlus 60**  

*   10MB data & 60 satellite messages per SIM/month.
*   Pooled usage across SIMs.

[Discover our satellite plans](https://www.emnify.com/satellite-iot-solution)

04

Pick your support level
-----------------------

Your product’s uptime is paramount to us. Whether you need faster response times from a dedicated support agent or a higher Service Level Obligation, we’ve got the right support level to fit your individual needs.

*   ### Standard support
    
    For businesses that need reliable day-to-day assistance.  
      
    Standard Support is included with every plan, giving you the peace of mind that someone is always there when things need a quick fix. Choose this option if you manage small to medium deployments that occasionally need help.
    
    **Availability** Standard business hours (8am - 5pm, CET)
    
    **How to reach us**  
    Support ticket
    
    **What to expect**  
    Most issues are solved quickly, with detailed guides and documentation available for self-service support.
    
*   ### Business support
    
    With Business Support, you’ll benefit from extended hours, quicker response times, and a dedicated account manager who knows your IoT setup. This level is ideal for companies scaling their IoT operations that need personalized assistance to keep things on track.
    
    **Availability**  
    24/7/365—around the clock, every day of the year

*   ### Enterprise support
    
    For those “we need this fixed now” moments.
    
    If your IoT deployment is mission-critical, Enterprise Support gives you access to a dedicated engineer, 24/7 coverage, and proactive monitoring to prevent problems before they even happen.
    
    **Availability**

What is the IoT SuperNetwork?
-----------------------------

### IoT connectivity for cloud-based businesses

Our cloud-native network gives you seamless integration, a global presence, and transparency into the multiple layers of the communication stack.

### A purpose-built global IoT network

Embracing cloud-native advantages, the SuperNetwork has real-time scalability and unparalleled availability so your business can thrive.

### Future-proof your IoT business

The SuperNetwork is a modern, cloud-based solution that synergizes with your existing tools, portals, interfaces, and APIs.

### A converged cellular and satellite solution

The SuperNetwork converges cellular and [satellite connectivity](https://www.emnify.com/satellite-iot-solution) for greater network reliability and global reach, reducing operational overhead.

In real-time and across all networks.](https://www.emnify.com/iot-dashboard)[![Image 61: sim-card](https://www.emnify.com/hubfs/Assets/Icons%20Large/sim-card.svg) ### emnify IoT eSIM Fully customize your eSIM profile according to your needs, location, and specific use case.](https://www.emnify.com/iot-supernetwork/emnify-iot-esim)

Everything you need
-------------------

### Automated integrations

An API-first design enables easy integration of all connectivity management capabilities into your IoT operations, applications and services.

### End-to-end security

Increase the level of protection on your data and your devices, lowering costs, increasing IoT device uptime, and complying with relevant network security policies.

### Full support

With decades of experience in setting the standard for cloud-native IoT connectivity, emnify gives you round-the-clock support when you need it, ensuring uninterrupted service and peace of mind.
